nodes.text: The Third Nantama Synod was a meeting of the Lords of the Senex-Juvex that was held on the world Nantama.

Following the marriage of the warlord Osted Picutorion to the Senex Princess Farasa Anturi in 553 BBY, a conflict known as the Crimson Days broke out in the Senex sector. A synod was held on the world Nantama and ended the conflict, by accepting Picutorion's marriage and the independence of the planet Hutlar, which Picutorion had liberated.
